segments.text: I notice the garden outside the window looks so peaceful and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a contrast to the chaos unfolding inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of calm looking at the garden, away from the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The path and the low bushes seem so well-maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman in the kitchen is the one who takes care of the garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame she's missing out on the tranquility outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Instead, she's stuck dealing with the overflowing sink and the mischievous kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she deserves a break, a moment to enjoy her beautiful garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene makes me appreciate the little moments of peace in life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she gets to enjoy her garden soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
